description: Glameow is a grey cat, with a curled, spring-shaped tail and a white fluff at the tip of it. It has a crescent shaped head with two ears, the tips of which are white. It also has a small black nose, yellow eyes with blue irises, and white paws. Three out of every four Glameow are female, similar to how almost all tortoiseshell/calico-patterned cats are female. Glameow is exclusive to Pok√©mon Pearl. In the anime, Glameow is owned by Dawn`s mother, Johanna, and also Dawn`s contest rival, Zoey. It is also a favorite of Team Galactic.
name: Nyarmar
